column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This review is only for their brunch. I had great things about their brunch so my friends and I finally decided to try it out. Our server was really nice. I ordered a mimosa and couldn't decide on what to eat so my husband suggested the Old Faithful. I was like cool can't go wrong with the traditional plate but I was wrong. I was so disappointed
column2: the worst part of that plate were the hash browns. Those hash browns were nasty
column3: they had zero flavor. Everyone else in my party seemed to enjoy their food. I probably won't be coming back for brunch.
